name: Disney•Pixar Monsters, Inc.: Wreck Room Arcade
name_original: Disney•Pixar Monsters, Inc.: Wreck Room Arcade
description:
Disney•Pixar Monsters, Inc.: Wreck Room Arcade is an arcade game developed by Sapient Gaming. It was originally released in 2001. Disney Interactive published the game.
Disney•Pixar Monsters, Inc.: Wreck Room Arcade is available on PC.
